solution_line_template: He will lose {pounds_lost_per_hour} x {exercise_hours_per_day} = <<{pounds_lost_per_hour}*{exercise_hours_per_day}={pounds_lost_per_day}>>{pounds_lost_per_day} pounds per day.
So he will lose {pounds_lost_per_day} x {days_per_week} = <<{pounds_lost_per_day}*{days_per_week}={pounds_lost_per_week}>>{pounds_lost_per_week} pounds per week.
So, he will lose {pounds_lost_per_week}x {num_weeks} = <<{pounds_lost_per_week}*{num_weeks}={total_pounds_lost}>>{total_pounds_lost} pounds after {num_weeks} weeks.
Therefore, he will weigh {ajax_weight_lbs} - {total_pounds_lost} = <<{ajax_weight_lbs}-{total_pounds_lost}={final_weight_lbs}>>{final_weight_lbs} pounds after {num_weeks} weeks.
